title: How to buy rune page?
body: Hi, can s.o help me figuring where to buy the rune page in the store? I tried to look for it but couldnt find it

replies.body:
You should find it under *Gameplay* if you ensure the category sorting on the left all say **Show All**.

Let me know if this helped!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eV4TgNdl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-30T21:44:49.973+0000)
>
> You should find it under *Gameplay* if you ensure the category sorting on the left all say **Show All**.
> 
> Let me know if this helped!

Thanks. it helped
I was going to ask the same question, but I found the answer [here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/msL0gATz-rune-pages)

> [{quoted}](name=DoctorAnonymous,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eV4TgNdl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-30T21:37:20.422+0000)
